title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #95
body:
## Date and Time

Oct 11, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [Shanghai](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/shanghai.md) & [Capella](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/specs/capella)
- [Shanghai page](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/shanghai_upgrade/index.html) at ECH website
   
### 2. Events & hackathon
- [Devcon](https://devcon.org/) Oct 11-14, 2022
- [ETHIndia](https://ethindia.co/) Dec 2nd - 4th, 2022

### 3. New initiative/association
- Decentralized meeting - Huddle01


### 4. ECH updates
- ECH Stats.
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders) - 6469 Followers
    - [Discord](https://discord.io/EthCatHerders) - Over 1.25k users
    - [YouTube](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A) - Over 2.7k subscribers
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ethereum-cat-herders/) - 247 Followers
- [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
   - Pull Request](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/pulls)
      - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/pull/73
      - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/pull/71
   - [Issues](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues)
      - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/70
      - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/69
      - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/67
      - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/66
      - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/65
      - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/62
      
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - [EIP bot](https://github.com/ethereum/EIP-Bot/issues) & [EIPV](https://github.com/ethereum/eipv/issues)
  - [Learn2Earn](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- ECH Operations 
   - ECH GitHub backup & [YouTube backup](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/ECHBackup)
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- GitPOAP for EIP Authors, ACD meeting 150, CL meeting 100 & [The Merge](https://twitter.com/gitpoap/status/1569738148925657094)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 

  - All Core Dev meeting [notes 147](https://github.com/darkfire-rain/pm/blob/patch-1/AllCoreDevs-Meetings/Meeting%20147.md)
  - Consensus meeting [notes 96](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/634/commits/bc8e7a476b04abad170944ec4148b907c641b5a4)
  - EIP Improvement Process meeting 66    

**Other community meetings**
    -  EIP Editing Office Hour [Announcement](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/introducing-eip-editing-office-hour-9f04a95a26ba)  [Meeting 3 Recording](https://youtu.be/Rgl6JwGWmxU)
  - KZG-Ceremony Breakout Call # 8 [Recording](https://youtu.be/a8XoKo2-Q7c)

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 94](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/pull/319)

#### The date for the next meeting - Oct 25, 2022. 

 (Anything else, leave a comment.)
